reviews.review: Капец Чечня изменилась
A worth successor to the previous two installments, it's a fun game to play and a very good story.

Once or twice a year, I end up playing a game that I just can't bring myself to write something witty/funny about. Infinite is definitely one of them.

It's been 4 days since I finished it, and the OST (Will the Circle be Unbroken!) and ending just keep swirling in my head. I honestly have no jokes - that feels like belittling the great story that Infinite boasts of. 

All the time - despite the gorgeous visuals (dated for many, but I enjoyed them) - I believed it was going to be just another Bioshock game. But the ending ties in all the threads neatly - it's a delight to watch everything come together on the screen - that one magical moment when things fall into place, a puzzle piecing itself together in front of you when you didn't even realize that you were staring at one all the time.

I found the ending to be tragic and perfect at the same time - although it left me asking a lot more questions than any other Bioshock game. I won't go into plot details and spoilers - it's a case of 'the-less-you-know-going-in-the-better' with Bioshock Infinite - but I will say that the idea of parallel universes and timelines interacting with each other is explored in a tasteful manner here. 

There are quite a few new features - the most prominent one being the Sky-Line - but you can also spot the parallels between the items found in Rapture versus the ones you come across in Columbia (the setting of Infinite). Salts resemble Eve and Vigors resemble Plasmids - among other things.  

The environments are richly detailed, from posters on white superiority to religious propaganda and a ton of other items. There is the usual collectible - your audio tapes. Infinite brings in a new idea of ciphers - coded messages that require you to find another object, such as a book, to decipher them (which further lead you to a hidden location with generally a ton of supplies and an audio tape).  

You can't go wrong with Bioshock Infinite - I feel having played the previous instalments is also not mandatory for one to enjoy this title, although it would certainly enhance the experience, and certain portions of the ending. Definitely an addition to my list of story-rich favourites. 

(originally written on Oct. 23, 2019 for Not A Game Review)

god

This Game was amazing. I played it a long time ago on the ps3 and now the PC and It Was Great. Story was decent. Gameplay was good, gunplay is great, you can get upgrades for weapons and your Vigor which you unlock More Vigor throughout the game. Vigor is like a power up/perk and its well done. The Graphics still hold up in the year of 2019 and doesn't take that much to run it. it runs well on decent and slightly older Computers. I Highly Recommend this for good storytelling, good gunplay and action and more. Side Note: The Game is around 5-14 Hours long but it is worth it in the end.

It's just not very good, far too linear compared to the first too. You can only carry two weapons compared to like 8 or 9 in the first two. And there was just a lack of things to keep me interested game play wise. The story was great but playing it at times was just painful and not very fun. I wouldn't really say it's worth playing,

Ну тут как бы курсач и рядом не стоял, да. Жаль только, самое интересное так быстро закончилось

What a Game, Oh What a game! For FPS veterans it may not be much for its play-style, but I play games for the story most of times, and on occasions I go wild and play normal mode when I feel adventurous. The game was challenging enough without alienating me as some games do in that difficulty. The story was brilliant. Not clear from the start but unveiling as it goes, and with a great ending. It is definitely one of those worth playing and has not aged at all, while it was not a burden to my old rig. If you find it on sale go for it and Enjoy the story :) !
Schönes Spiel

Definitivamente, o melhor da trilogia!
             Como sempre Bioshock é um exemplo de como se contar uma história e manter o jogador imerso em seu mundo. O terror persiste de maneira reduzida mas não estar mais sozinho deixa a sensação quase nula. É um excelente jogo, A muito tempo algo não me deixava com a cabeça revirada como Este jogo o fez.
                                                     *IMPORTANTE*
O jogo possui um problema constante com travamentos não importando a qualidade gráfica ou resolução, então não, não é o seu PC :V. Co umas fáceis pesquisas cê consegue dar uma amenizada no problema, mas nunca resolverá. De qualquer modo entrar e sair do jogo garante de uma á uma hora e meia sem o problema, incômodo! Mas jogável.

Un excellent jeu.
Vraiment excellent.
Je comprends tout à fait que pour certains, le gameplay puisse ne pas être très bon. Je ne suis pas un grand fan de FPS, donc j'ai moins d'attentes par rapport à ça, c'est d'autres éléments du jeu qui m'interpellent.
L'histoire, pour moi, est exceptionnelle, même si j'ai eu du mal à saisir tous les détails à la première partie (le rôle des Lutèce par exemple). Il n'y a pas seulement les twists de fin (prévisibles pour certains, selon notre expérience de ce genre d'histoire), mais la narration, bien que nécessairement très découpée par les phases de gamplay, est excellente.
Mais surtout, c'est l'univers qui est exceptionnel. Alors j'ai bien conscience de ne pas être objectif, j'aime ce qui tend vers le steampunk, j'aime les cités volantes, j'aime les univers lumineux, et j'aime les mondes parallèles. Donc quand on combine tout ça...
La musique est également excellente, très très bien arrangée, et contribue très bien à l'univers.
Sur un point négatif, c'est vrai que j'ai fait des pauses de quelques temps à certains endroits où les combats s'enchaînaient. Un peu répétitif. Puis j'ai repris, et je n'ai plus arrêté jusqu'à la fin...
Bioshock Infinite fait partie de ces jeux que j'apprécie encore plus avec le temps qui passe et en les refaisant. 
Maintenant j'attends le même jeu dans un style Action/RPG à la Skyrim, avec des dialogues, des quêtes... Enfin, n'importe quoi qui permette de retourner dans cette atmosphère... Même si ça n'arrivera probablement pas dans cet univers.

It's downgraded version of previous two Bioshocks in pretty much every way. Really bland arcadish game. I liked Burial at Sea dlcs, but couldn't stand main game. The amazing atmosphere of Rapture is gone. The original 2 Bioshock games were dark and combat was for survival, here gameplay is extremely arcadish, it's like Borderlands. First half hour was nothing, but walk in the park, boring as hell and then it went no depth, but combat. Also there is no map, mostly linear level design which is yet somehow complicated, horrible enemy A.I. and 2 weapon limit. I did find ending twist pretty good, but most of the story leading towards it isn't interesting as well as the very bland characters. Not just worst game in the franchise, I think it's one of the worst sequels of all time.


4/10

Где-то в 2014 году , я увидел на youtube "прохождение BioShock Infinite", запустил, посмотрел немного, не поравилось.
На этой неделе , я увидел ее по скидке, а почему бы не купить. После первых двух часов игры, я был в восторге, прошел игру и был еще в более сильном восторге от дизайна, задумки, а самое главное концовки этого шедевра. 
моя оценка: 10 соловьев из 10

Oyunun hikayesi çok iyiydi. Alan Wake gibi karmaşık bir hikayesi var, Hatta paralel evren teorisi ve kuantum fiziğine uzaksanız size tam karman çorman gelecek. Oyun içinde hep, "aaa bu niye böyle ya" , " bu kişiler de kim" , burasi niye böyle dediğiniz veya buna benzer sorguladığınız ne varsa hepsi en sonda çözülüyor, ama işin karmaşık kısmı hepsi çözülmüyor bazı kısımlar hala uçuk ne olduğunu tam bilemiyorsunuz. Oyun sonları mükemmeldi. HİKAYE MÜKEMMEL. ama bu oyunu oynayacaklara tavsiyem Bioshock 1 ve 2 yi de oynayın önce. 1 ile bazı bağlantıları var. Oyunun Hikayesi benim için TOP5 de şuan. ( Max Payne, Alan Wake, The Darkness, Metro, Bioshock, Half life... bunlar efsane hikayelere sahip oyunlar ve bioshock da bunlardan biri. 
Gerçekten yazacak bir şey bulamıyorum kesinlikle oynanması gereken bir oyun ." BIOSHOCK INFINITE " ( Elizabeth ne tatlısın ama ya )
Baştan söyliyim Elizabeth e aşık olmayın sonradan pişman olursunuz :d
